title: What we do at kindergarten
creator_credit: Myles-Milwright Productions, Dianne Milwright, Donn Clauscen and Pamela Eagles
brief_description: Shows daily activities in kindergartens emphasising the extent activities aid the preschool child’s development. Suitable for use with parents of kindergarten age children and for infant primary teachers as a background knowledge of what happens in kindergartens.
